General.Name: Zhiyang Innovation Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Zhiyang Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells power equipment in China. It offers transmission line monitoring and management systems, DC power supply monitoring and management systems, substation auxiliary patrol systems, integrated monitoring systems, distribution network operation and maintenance systems, and AC/DC integrated power supply systems. The company also provides production integration, project implementation, and marketing services for online monitoring systems. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Zibo, China.
